item.title: About
item.description: My name is Debashis. and I’m a software executive and systems architect focusing on building and delivering innovative products. I specialize in cloud computing and large-scale telecom systems. I am insiped by a character named Milo Pressman from the TV show 24. Check him out here. Currently, I’m building a ruby-chess-engine and ruby-algorithmic-trading. If you want to reach out to me, you can do it via GitHub, Facebook, Telegram or Email.
